content: basketweave dish drying mat by catnip cottage materials directions 7 oz cotton yarn 352 yards chain 58 size i hook or size needed for gauge row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet across 56 sts darning needle to weave in ends gauge 12 sts to 4 in basketweave pattern if row 2 chain 2 skip 1st double_crochet *3 fpdc 3 bpdc* your gauge is not exact your mat will be small- repeat from * to * across end with double_crochet in top er or larger than the pattern size loop of previous row s turning chain finished dimensions 15 ½ x 18 size may row 3 repeat row 2 vary slightly depending on gauge row 4 chain 2 skip 1st double_crochet *3 bpdc 3 fpdc* re- peat from * to * across end with double_crochet in top loop of previous row s turning chain abbreviations and terms row 5 repeat row 4 chain chain work row 2-5 ending with row 3 or 5 until 18 double_crochet double_crochet long or desired length fpdc front post double_crochet working with hook on front side of work yarn over slip hook from r to l behind post of double_crochet of row be- low yarn over and pull through yarn over and pull through 2 loops yarn over and pull through 2 loops bpdc back post double_crochet working with hook on back side of work yarn over slip hook from r to l around front of post of double_crochet of row below yarn over and pull through yarn over and pull through 2 loops yarn over and pull through 2 loops © catnip cottage 2014
